Unlocking UK market with Bupa

Summary

I designed a clinician-driven version of our US Health Insights service to allow us to partner with our client Bupa and launch in the UK.

The need

Our client Bupa wanted a service they could include as part of their health assessment. So we needed to modify our US service to make it clinician driven.

MHRA approval

I interviewed GPs to ensure test safety and was successful in achieving MHRA approval.

More work

Unlocking Uber transit. I designed a way to use our fare collection technology in partner apps, driving ticket sales for our client RTD by 39.2% and Uber trips in Denver starting or ending at a transport station by 11.6%. →

Gifting garden memberships. I designed a garden membership gifting service, driving £32k revenue over Xmas 2021 and unblocking 13 gardens from partnering with us. →

Driving garden visitation. I led the design of a new home page in March 2022, turning it into a destination and improving bounce rate by -5% over a two week period. →

Tuning the test kit. I designed a new sample experience increasing usable samples by 4.7% in Nov 2023. →

Visual examples. A collection of visual concepts. →
